properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where RegistryKey endswith "\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutDlls" or RegistryKey endswith "\\Services\\DHCPServer\\Parameters\\CalloutEnabled"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the installation of a Callout DLL via CalloutDlls and CalloutEnabled parameter in Registry, which can be used to execute code in context of the DHCP server (restart required)
